Class GetFeaturesCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command.AbstractCommand
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command.GetFeaturesCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GetFeaturesCommand
extends AbstractCommand
    Implementation for sending RequestCommand.GET_FEATURES. Processes a ResponseMessage.FEATURES as response.
    Author:
    sven
